newsitem.title: UK: Christie's to raise $75 mln via private placement.
newsitem.headline: Christie's to raise $75 mln via private placement.

text.p: Christie's International Plc said in a statement on Monday that it intends to raise $75 million of long-term debt through a private placement with U.S. institutional investors.
Christie's is being advised on the placement by SPP Hambro.
There was no indication of when the placement would take place or the maturity and structure of the bond.

The funds will be used to finance Christie's recently announced commitment to new premises in the Rockefeller Centre in New York, and to support expansion of Christie's facilities elsewhere in the world, particularly in Paris, the statement said.
